Class TheGrid

java.lang.Object
TheGrid
public class TheGrid
extends java.lang.Object
The grid holds where everything. This is done by making eahc part of the 2-D array as a tile. The grid is converted from pixels to single ints to keep track of a 40x18 grid.

  • Method Details

    • setTileAt

      public void setTileAt​(int x, int y, int type)
      Sets the tile to that type at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate.
      y - the y coordinate.
      type - the type to change the tile to.

    • setTrueTileAt

      public void setTrueTileAt​(float x, float y, int type)
      Get the pixel coordinates and replace the given tile
      Parameters:
      x - pixel coordinate for x
      y - pixel coordinate for y
      type - set the tile type to this

    • getPixelType

      public int getPixelType​(float x, float y)
      Input a pixel coordinate to get the type at the spot
      Parameters:
      x - pixel x to be converted into the grid
      y - pixel y to be converted into the grid
      Returns:
      return the type of the tile

    • getTileAt

      public int getTileAt​(int x, int y)
      Gets the tile type at a given grid coordinate.
      Parameters:
      x - int coordinate for x.
      y - int coordinate for y.
      Returns:
      the tile type.

    • getPixelTileAt

      public Tile getPixelTileAt​(float x, float y)
      Same as getTileAt but accepts pixel coordinates instead. Converts x by dividing out the single tile size. Converts y by removing the topBuffer of 144 pixels and then dividing out the single tile size.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate in pixels.
      y - the y coordinate in pixels.
      Returns:
      returns the tile at the coordinate.
